update erp_qualified_rate set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, work_order_no = #{workOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prd_no = #{prdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prd_name = #{prdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zz_prd_count = #{zzPrdCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qualified_rate = #{qualifiedRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from erp_qualified_rate where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= DATE(create_time)
